title: Jim (Jimi) Jamison - When Love Comes Down (1991)  EAC, FLAC
description:
This is Jimi Jamison's first solo effort following Survivor's 1988 studio album, Too Hot to Sleep.  It is vintage Jimi, with powerful vocals (the songs, however, are subpar).  Jimi has one of the best voices ever to front a rock band, hence the nickname "Golden Throat".  Posting here before I sell the disk on eBay.

Track listing:

Jim Jamison - When Love Comes Down - 01 - Taste of Love.flac               
Jim Jamison - When Love Comes Down - 02 - Johnny's Got a Shotgun.flac      
Jim Jamison - When Love Comes Down - 03 - When Love Comes Down.flac        
Jim Jamison - When Love Comes Down - 04 - Long Walk Home.flac              
Jim Jamison - When Love Comes Down - 05 - True Lovers.flac                 
Jim Jamison - When Love Comes Down - 06 - If You Walk Away.flac            
Jim Jamison - When Love Comes Down - 07 - Cry Alone.flac                   
Jim Jamison - When Love Comes Down - 08 - I Believe In Love.flac           
Jim Jamison - When Love Comes Down - 09 - Rock Hard.flac                   
Jim Jamison - When Love Comes Down - 10 - Angry Young Man.flac
